sources.title: Gaston Is Here (1957)
sources.description: Gaston Le Crayon is a French artist who brings his artwork to life. He's doing a famous painting to be. Movie director Alfred Fitchcock moves in next door. Fitchcock is making a movie about a man stranded in the frozen Arctic. Gaston takes it seriously. He paints a toaster, stuffs the freezing man in it, and pops him out like a piece of toast. Gaston thinks that he's doing a good deed. Fitchcock is furious. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/gaston-is-here-1957/

metadata.Plot: A young boy uses his esp to control a robot created by his wheel chair bound Uncle, and together they combat the forces of evil.
metadata.Actors: Tommy Terrell, Arthur Space, Bruce Cowling, Alan Reynolds
